name: Alien Apartement
description:
WHISPERING EONS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/whispering-eons-trailer/id1048578750?l=fr&ls=1&mt=8
JOIN COMMUNITY FOR MORE NEWS: https://plus.google.com/u/1/communities/111327287359172900446

Take a virtual reality tour of an apartment like you will never be able to see in real life and discover Ryan & Eden's life! (Get the latest updates on G+ with Ryan: https://plus.google.com/108926424989499203010/)

>>> Background
The scene is set on an alien world with an original ambient sound track and will be updated regularly.
Walk, look, interact and talk like in every classic adventure game.
Learn more about Ryan (the main protagonist of the game) his world and discover some glimpses of the game inside the demo.

>>> Available control methods
- Basic (Cardboard not customized with head strap): Magnet triggers action A / staring triggers action B.
- Standard [Recommended] (any HMD / Cardboard strapped to your head): Flick* right triggers action A / Left action B.
- Gamer: Bluetooth Game pad or keyboard (keys: Y for action A / U for action B)
- Dummy: On screen controls if you want to run the demo with a basic 3D display
Detailed controls are explained in the included tutorial.
Do not forget to wear headphones in order to enjoy the soundtrack.


>>> Features
* A mini puzzle game is hidden in the demo: Will you find out what Ryan is up to late in the night?
* Cardboard magnet and game pad compliant (but not required).
* A beautiful, walk-able apartment set in an another world
* A unique sky. Your planet is orbiting a gas giant named Gaea.
* A floor, stairs you can climb, a girl, bedroom, ...
* A beautiful sound track for full immersion.
* Interact with your environment (turn light off/on, ...)
* Dialogues between characters
* A Glass-like in sight HUD
* This demo requires a smartphone virtual reality kit / HMD (like Cardboard, freefly VR, Gear VR, Durovis Dive,Samsung Gear VR,...) and headphones for best experience.
* On screen controls available for basic experience

>> Settings
* Background music off option (Listen to your own music on another planet!!!)
* Stereo (Cardboard / freefly VR / Durovis DIVE / Gear VR / Homido / ...) mode or basic 3D mode.
* Enable/Disable Tutorial (you must complete it once)

ENJOY !
